description: Microsoft Office document file write events (.docx, .xlsx, .pptx, etc.). Captures metadata and hashes for Office documents written to disk, critical for detecting malicious macro documents and phishing attachments.

columns.name: aid
columns.description: Agent ID - unique identifier for the endpoint

columns.name: cid
columns.description: Customer ID - unique identifier for the CrowdStrike tenant

columns.name: UserName
columns.description: Username associated with the file write

columns.name: TargetFileName
columns.description: Full path to the written Office document

columns.name: FileName
columns.description: Base filename of the written Office document

columns.name: ContextProcessId
columns.description: Falcon's unique process identifier for the writing process

columns.name: WritingProcessFileName
columns.description: Base filename of the process that wrote the file

columns.name: MD5HashData
columns.description: MD5 hash of the written Office document

columns.name: SHA256HashData
columns.description: SHA256 hash of the written Office document

columns.name: ZoneIdentifier
columns.description: Mark of the Web (MOTW) zone identifier (Windows)

common_operations: Join with ProcessRollup2 via ContextProcessId for writing process details
Match hashes against threat intelligence feeds
Detect Office documents downloaded from internet (ZoneIdentifier=3)
Identify email attachments written by Outlook
Correlate with ScriptControl for macro execution detection
